duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver the highest level of customer service by helping people resolve issues as the first point of contact.
Update, maintain, and dispatch tickets routed to the ticketing systems.
Configure and customize the ServiceNow platform to meet specific needs, including designing and implementing workflows, forms, fields, tables, and other platform components.
Create and manage reports, dashboards, and metrics within ServiceNow and generate reports on key performance indicators, analyzing data, and providing insights.
Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions within ServiceNow.
Work with other teams to make recommendations on the efficient use of ServiceNow features and capabilities to enhance the customer experience.
Understand the full suite of tools for integrating application modules between other applications and/or vendors.
Continuously review business and IT processes, technologies, and deployments and make recommendations for improvements.
Document and train users on IT systems and standard methodologies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
